acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should not fill POJO's attributes annotated with @PodamExclude
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldNotFillFieldsAnnotatedWithExcludeAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ExcludeAnnotationPojo
Then the Pojo ExcludeAnnotationPojo ( intField = 102173563 somePojo = null ) should not be null
Then the int field should not be zero
Then any field annotated with @PodamExclude should be null
